title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integrations.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama with async support and streaming responses.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, providing LLM and chat interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with Ollama models directly in Discord servers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipeline using Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community-maintained Node.js wrapper around the Ollama REST API with TypeScript definitions.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API with tokio support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama with idiomatic interfaces and context cancellation.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Simple React chat app bootstrapped with Vite and consuming local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama enabling conversational AI inside Slack channels.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing admin UI and REST endpoints for managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service wrapping Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints and rate limiting.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM completions and summarization into your vault.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI macOS menu-bar app for quick access to Ollama models and chat history.
